title: Reactions to racist posts on social media in the U.S. 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.

The maximum Share of respondents 40.0 is found at Response Ignore the post and the minimum is found at Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.) where Share of respondents is 6.0.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 34.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Ignore the post and lowest at Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).
There is a difference of 34.0 between the maximum Response Ignore the post and minimum Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).
Share of respondents at Response Ignore the post is 40.0 , second place is  at 40.0, and thirdly is Comment on/ reply to the post at 17.0.
The Response Ignore the post has 1.98 times more Share of respondents than average.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 101.0.

data.Response: Comment on/ reply to the post
